item.title: Words and sentences
item.summary: |xam words and sentences, which appear to refer to parts of the body. Names of portions of the body of an animal. By lhan≠kass’o (L VIII.-31. 8774, 8772 rev. and 8773 rev.).
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-31
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
